title: 10 fps during teamfights?
body:
so my average is around 20 when there is not much action. but when there is  a teamfight or something i only get like 10 or 9fps.
how can i raise it to 40 or 50

my computer is windows 7 32 bit
intel core i3 2.93GHz
4gb ram
intel hd graphics
directx 11

or is my computer just that bad??
